articles.title: Life during the time of novel coronavirus
articles.description: CNN Senior International Correspondent Ivan Watson talks to Hong Kong residents about what it is like to live in a city in the midst of the novel coronavirus outbreak.

articles.title: Immunologist: Coronavirus has 'the makings of a pandemic'
articles.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci warns that person-to-person Coronavirus transmission outside of China without definitive origin has 'the makings of a  pandemic.'

articles.title: Woman records racist coronavirus rant while on subway
articles.description: CNN's Anderson Cooper spoke to Tanny Jiraprapasuke, who was verbally attacked while riding the subway in Los Angeles. This comes amid a string of racist attacks on Asians in the US due to hysteria around the coronavirus.

articles.author: Helen Regan, CNN
articles.title: Fears over containing novel coronavirus grow as cases outside China spike
articles.description: Concerns are growing over the global spread of the novel coronavirus after a spike in cases outside of mainland China among people with no connection to China or the city of Wuhan, ground zero for the outbreak.
articles.content:
Hong Kong (CNN)Concerns are growing over the global spread of the novel coronavirus after a spike in cases outside of mainland China among people with no connection to China or the city of Wuhan, ground zero for the outbreak.

articles.title: Top US immunologist: We are clearly at the brink of a pandemic
articles.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci, who is the director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, explains what a pandemic is and says we're nearly at the brink of one with the novel coronavirus outbreak.

articles.title: Spike linked to religious group
articles.description: More than half of South Korea's novel coronavirus cases can be linked to the Shincheonji religious group. Officials say one member attended services in the southern city of Daegu while infected. Religious services have since been shut down to stop the spread.…

articles.author: Paul LeBlanc, CNN
articles.title: Washington Post: Trump furious after officials let Americans with coronavirus return to US from Japan
articles.description: President Donald Trump became enraged with senior advisers this week when 14 Americans who tested positive for the coronavirus were brought back to the US from Japan after he had been told they would remain quarantined overseas, administration officials told …
articles.content: Washington (CNN)President Donald Trump became enraged with senior advisers this week when 14 Americans who tested positive for the coronavirus were brought back to the US from Japan after he had been told they would remain quarantined overseas, administration… [+2051 chars]

articles.author: By Helen Regan and Adam Renton, CNN
articles.title: Coronavirus fears grow as global cases spike
articles.description: The novel coronavirus is spreading rapidly around the world, with Iran reporting a spike in numbers and Italy reporting its first death.
articles.content:
A 78-year-old man who tested positive for the novel coronavirus has died at a hospital in Padua, northern Italy. 
It is Italy's first death from the coronavirus, that is quickly spreading around the world. The country has reported 14 new confirmed casesof th… [+855 chars]

articles.author: Anneken Tappe, CNN Business
articles.title: Coronavirus fears have pushed the US dollar to a three-year high
articles.description: The US dollar index reached a three-year high as investors worried about the global coronavirus outbreak are moving their money into the safe-haven greenback.

articles.author: Luke McGee, CNN
articles.title: A controversial religious group is at the center of South Korea's coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: More than half of South Korea's novel coronavirus cases are linked to a controversial religious group in the southern city of Daegu.
